@pixi/core > PIXI > TextureSystem

PIXI.TextureSystem 

class TextureSystem extends PIXI.System implements PIXI.ISystem

System plugin to the renderer to manage textures.

Constructor

new PIXI.TextureSystem(renderer: PIXI.Renderer) → {}
Parameters:
Name Type Description
renderer PIXI.Renderer

The renderer this System works for.

bind TextureSystem.ts:131 
bind(texture_: PIXI.Texture | PIXI.BaseTexture, location: number) → {void}

Bind a texture to a specific location

If you want to unbind something, please use unbind(texture) instead of bind(null, textureLocation)

ensureSamplerType(maxTextures: number) → {void}

Ensures that current boundTextures all have FLOAT sampler type, see PIXI.SAMPLER_TYPES for explanation.
